```{r data}
inpF<-paste0(inpD,"proteinGroupsM1M0Mono-log2LFQmedian.txt")
data<-read.csv(inpF,sep="\t")
dataS<-as.matrix(data[,c(1:3)],rownames=T)
dataS<-apply(dataS, 2, as.numeric)
dataS[dataS==0]=NA
rn<-strsplit(data$T..Gene.names,";")
rn<-paste(sapply(rn, "[", 1))#,sapply(rn, "[", 3),sapply(rn, "[", 6))
#rn<-strsplit(rn, "-")
row.names(dataS)<-rn
cn<-strsplit(colnames(dataS), "_")
colnames(dataS)<-paste(sapply(cn, "[", 1))#,sapply(cn, "[", 4))
summary(dataS)
plot(dataS)
limma::vennDiagram(dataS>0)
```
